title: Unknown icon appears when I try to send photos (looks like an upside down 'downloading' icon)
content:
I have recently noticed the 'upwards arrow' icon below (next to the time), which appears whenever I try to send a photo (e.g. via Snap Chat). I have never noticed this icon before.

It looks like an upside down 'downloading' icon. It disappears when the photo has been sent.

Any ideas what it is, why it appears and what it's for?

Thanks very much!
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3
